subsection.name: General
subsection.p: This widget creates a menubar on an application window or extends the current application window menu with the newly specified menu items (eg in MDI like applications).

tr.td: The path to the gui xml file

this option is not mandatory. valid values : save and cancel, If save is specified it will check if all required fields actually have content and if cancel is clicked it will not check required fields. add, update and delete if used in combination with tables. It will also create popupmenus in the table. You can add the property updateButtons and a comma delimted list of the buttons to the table to get this functional.
